library(leaflet)

library(sf)
library(rgdal)
library(rprojroot)

## get gpx track

# add gpx tracks
leaflet() %>%
  # add gpx tracks
  addPolylines(data=tag1, color = "red") %>%

  # add special points

  addTiles() # Add default OpenStreetMap map tiles
